fulltext:
BUI TAN DANG 
27/09/1996 
144/18 Au Co, Ward 9, Tan Binh District, HCMC   
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY 
I’m a web developer, with experience working with ReactJS and NodeJS. I ‘ve been involved in 
several projects and wide range of positions: Stitch & Heart, EcoFrostProtection, Zegal, PromoPop. 
EDUCATION 
2014 - 2018: Bachelor in Software Engineering - HCM UNIVERSITY OF TECHNOLOGY 
AND EDUCATION 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
JavaScript 
ReactJS, NodeJS, ES6, React Native, TypeScript 
HTML/CSS 
HTML5, CSS3, CSS Preprocessor (SCSS) 
Bundler  Webpack 
Database 
MongoDB, Postgres 
VCS  Git 
Deployment 
Heroku, VPS 
Tools 
Jira, Trello, Excel, Zeplin, airtable 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
Work fulltime at VRED (Fintech & E-commerce company) 
October 2018 – now 
I kept the key role as web developer at the company and intern management. My responsibility is to 
build the web application from scratch. 
My role and responsibilities: 
• Implement features and functions of the website. 
• Analyze & Optimize web performance. 
• Implement layout designs. 
• Write API for projects 
Technologies Utilized: Webpack, NodeJS, ReactJS, HTML5/CSS3, MongoDB, Postgress, 
Typescript. 
Demo: - https://www.vaylaithap.vn 
- https://vred.vn/ 
Work part-time at Unlimited Design and Technology 
August 2018 – now 
Stitch & Heart 
February 2019 - now 
This project has an IOS app and a website for Admin. The IOS app is built on the IPad for selling 
clothes and allowing the customer to enter measurements to generate smart size. The 
Administration website is used for managing clients, orders, users, products. 
Headcount: 6 
Responsibilities: Implement layout designs, features, and functions of the project, including the 
IOS app and admin website. 
Technologies: Webpack, NodeJS, ReactJS, React Native, HTML5/CSS3, Redux, loopback 3, 
Typescript. 
EcoFrostProtection 
January 2019: 3 weeks 
A web application that manages and calculates the electricity consumption of vineyards. 
Headcount: 6 
Responsibilities: Implement layout designs, features and functions of the project. 
Technologies Utilized: Webpack, NodeJS, ReactJS, HTML5/CSS3, iotacss, firebase, Redux, 
plop. 
Zegal 
October 2018 – March 2019 
A website and mobile app that allow users to streamline sourcing and supply chain operations, 
associated with many factories to easily place orders and get the best prices. 
Headcount: 8 
Responsibilities: 
• Implement layout design, feature, and function of the project. 
• Analyze and design model schema. 
• Write API for backend. 
Technologies Utilized: Webpack, NodeJS, ReactJS, HTML5/CSS3, Graphql, Material UI. 
Demo: - https://uptrade.co/ 
PropmoPop 
August 2018 – October 2018 
A website that manages cosmetic/perfume brands promoted instores. The website can manage 
the staffs of the store and report directly on sales and get marketing material. 
Headcount: 6 
Responsibilities: 
• Implement layout designs, features, and functions of the project: UIDashboard, UIProduct, 
UILogIn, UISignUp, UIConfirmEmail,UI ResetPasswotd. 
• Write API for backend: getClients, getProducts, createProduct. 
Technologies Utilized: Webpack, NodeJS, ReactJS, HTML5/CSS3, Styled Components, 
Redux.
